trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all XML Web service client proxies that use the HTTP transport protocol.
trans-unit.target: Representerer basisklasse for alle XML-Web service-klienten proxy-servere som bruker HTTP-transportprotokollen.

trans-unit.source: The properties on this class are used to control the behavior of the HTTP request object used to transmit the XML Web service request and response.
trans-unit.target: Med egenskapene i denne klassen brukes til å kontrollere virkemåten for HTTP-forespørselsobjekt som brukes til å sende XML webtjenesteforespørselen og svar.

trans-unit.source: The properties map to properties found on <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for kartet til egenskapene som ble funnet på <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: To communicate with an XML Web service using HTTP, you must create a proxy class deriving indirectly or directly from HttpWebClientProtocol for the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: For å kommunisere med en XML-webtjeneste ved hjelp av HTTP, må du opprette en proxy-klassen som er avledet direkte eller indirekte fra HttpWebClientProtocol for XML-webtjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Instead of creating the proxy class manually, you can use the Wsdl.exe tool to create a proxy class for a given XML Web service's service description.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke Wsdl.exe-verktøyet til å opprette en proxy-klassen for en gitt XML Web service tjenestebeskrivelsen i stedet for å opprette proxy-klassen manuelt.

trans-unit.source: Since HttpWebClientProtocol is the base class for all proxy classes, its properties are on your proxy classes.
trans-unit.target: Siden HttpWebClientProtocol er basisklasse for alle proxy-klassen, er egenskapene for proxy-klasser.

trans-unit.source: These properties are useful for controlling the request behavior of the underlying transport.
trans-unit.target: Disse egenskapene er nyttig for å kontrollere forespørselen virkemåten for den underliggende transporten.

trans-unit.source: For example, use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy%2A> property for calling XML Web services through a firewall.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel bruke den <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy%2A>egenskapen for å kalle XML-webtjenester gjennom en brannmur.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy%2A>

trans-unit.source: Many of these properties are used to initialize the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> that makes the Web request.
trans-unit.target: Mange av egenskapene brukes til å initialisere den <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>som gjør Webforespørselen.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpGetClientProtocol>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpPostClientProtocol> derive directly or indirectly from HttpWebClientProtocol to provide support for SOAP, HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpGetClientProtocol>, og <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpPostClientProtocol>utledet direkte eller indirekte fra HttpWebClientProtocol å levere støtte for SOAP, HTTP-GET og HTTP-POST henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpPostClientProtocol> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpGetClientProtocol></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the client automatically follows server redirects.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om klienten følger automatisk serveromadresseringer.

trans-unit.source: If a client sends authentication information, such as a user name and password, you do not want to enable the server to redirect, because this can compromise security.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en klient sender godkjenningsinformasjon, for eksempel brukernavn og passord vil du ikke aktivere serveren å omdirigere, fordi dette kan kompromittere sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown if the AllowAutoRedirect property is `false` and the Web server attempts to redirect the request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.WebException>oppstår hvis egenskapen AllowAutoRedirect `false` og nettserveren prøver å omdirigere forespørselen.</xref:System.Net.WebException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> property contains an <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse> object, where both the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A> and <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.Headers%2A> properties reflect details regarding the attempted redirect.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>egenskapen inneholder en <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>objektet der både den <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A>og <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.Headers%2A>Egenskaper samsvar med detaljer om forsøk omadressering.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.Headers%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse> </xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A> property contains an <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> equivalent to one of the HTTP redirect status codes (301, 302, and 307) and the `Location` header within the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.Headers%2A> collection points to the URI that the request attempted to be redirected to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A>egenskapen inneholder en <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>tilsvarer en av HTTP-omadressering statuskoder (301 302 og 307) og `Location` toppteksten i den <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.Headers%2A>samlingen peker til URIEN forespørselen forsøkte å omdirigeres til.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.Headers%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> </xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically redirect the client to follow server redirects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å automatisk omdirigere klienten for å følge server omadresserer; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AllowAutoRedirect property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and the Web server attempts to redirect the request.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AllowAutoRedirect <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> og nettserveren prøver å omdirigere forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous call to an XML Web service method, unless the call has already completed.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter en asynkron kall til en XML-Web service-metoden hvis kallet er allerede fullført.

trans-unit.source: The object provided in the last parameter to the asynchronous call of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Begin" name="Begin" href=""></xref> method.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som ble angitt i parameteren siste asynkrone-kallet for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Begin" name="Begin" href=""> </xref> metoden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of client certificates.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av klientsertifikater.

trans-unit.source: This property allows a client to pass one or more client certificates, also known as Authenticode X.509 v.3 certificates, when calling an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan en klient skal sendes også kjent som Authenticode X.509 v.3 sertifikater klientsertifikater én eller flere når du kaller en metode for XML-Web-tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: If the XML Web service method has been configured to use client certificates, a client certificate can be used as one mechanism for authenticating a client.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden XML Web service er konfigurert til å bruke klientsertifikater, kan et klientsertifikat brukes som én mekanisme for å godkjenne en klient.

trans-unit.source: For details on setting up client certificates, see the Internet Information Services (IIS) documentation.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer klientsertifikater, kan du se dokumentasjonen for Internet Information Services (IIS).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> that represents the client certificates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> som representerer klientsertifikatene.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of cookies.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir samlingen av informasjonskapsler.

trans-unit.source: If an XML Web service method uses session state, then a cookie is passed back in the response headers to the XML Web service client that uniquely identifies the session for that XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en XML-Web service-metode bruker økttilstanden, er deretter en informasjonskapsel sendt tilbake i svarhoder til XML Web service-klienten som identifiserer økten for at XML-Web service-klienten.

trans-unit.source: In order for an XML Web service to maintain session state for a client, the client must store the cookie.
trans-unit.target: At en XML-webtjeneste å beholde økttilstanden for en klient, må klienten, lagre informasjonskapselen.

trans-unit.source: Clients receive the HTTP cookie by creating a new instance of <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer> and assigning that to the CookieContainer property of the proxy class before calling the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Klienter mottar HTTP-informasjonskapselen ved å opprette en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>og tilordne at til egenskapen CookieContainer for proxy-klassen før du kaller XML-Web-metoden.</xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>

trans-unit.source: If you need to maintain session state beyond when the proxy class instance goes out of scope, the client must store the HTTP cookie between calls to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde økttilstanden utover når proxy klasseforekomsten er utenfor området, må klienten lagre HTTP-informasjonskapselen mellom kallene til XML-webtjenesten.

trans-unit.source: For instance, a Web Forms client can store the HTTP cookie by saving the <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer> in its own session state.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en Web-skjemaer-klient kan lagre HTTP-informasjonskapselen ved lagring av <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>i sin egen økttilstanden.</xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>

trans-unit.source: Because not all XML Web services use session state and thus clients are not always required to use the CookieContainer property of a client proxy, the documentation for the XML Web service must state whether session state is used.
trans-unit.target: Fordi ikke alle XML-webtjenester Bruk status for økten, og dermed klienter ikke alltid kreves for å bruke egenskapen CookieContainer på en proxy-klienten, må dokumentasjonen for XML-webtjenesten status om øktstatus er brukt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer> that represents the cookies for a Web Services client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>som representerer informasjonskapslene for en klient nettjenester.</xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether decompression is enabled for this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om dekomprimering er aktivert for dette <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if decompression is enabled for this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dekomprimering er aktivert for dette <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref> for each XML Web service method exposed by the specified type, and stores the mappings in the specified <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"> </xref> tjeneste metoden eksponert i den angitte typen for hver XML-webområdet, og lagrer tilordningene i den angitte <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> that exposes the XML Web service methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>som viser av XML-metoder.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that is used to store the mappings.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> som brukes til å lagre tilordningene.

trans-unit.source: if type can be assigned to a ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if type can be assigned to a ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref> for each XML Web service method exposed by the specified types, and stores the mappings in the specified <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref>, as well as in a <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that this method returns.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"> </xref> tjeneste metoden vises av de angitte typene for hver XML-webområdet, og lagrer tilordningene i den angitte <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref>samt som i en <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> som returnerer denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Type> that contains the types that expose the XML Web service methods.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref:System.Type>som inneholder typene som eksponerer i XML-metoder.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that is used to store the mappings.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> som brukes til å lagre tilordningene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref> for each XML Web service method exposed by the specified types.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"> </xref> for hver XML Web service-metoden vises av de angitte typene.

trans-unit.source: The types contained in types are used as keys.
trans-unit.target: Typene i types brukes som nøkler.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> for the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>for den angitte URIEN.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> for creating the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: På <xref:System.Uri>for å opprette <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The created <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Den opprettede <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The uri parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The uri parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Returns a response from a synchronous request to an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et svar fra en synkron forespørsel til en XML-Web service-metoden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> from which to get the response.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>som ikke hente svaret.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: A response from a synchronous request to an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Et svar fra en synkron forespørsel til en XML-Web service-metoden.

trans-unit.source: Returns a response from an asynchronous request to an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et svar fra en asynkron forespørsel til en XML-Web service-metoden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> from which to get the response.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>som ikke hente svaret.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to pass to <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse*> when the response has completed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>skal sendes til <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse*>når svaret er fullført.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: A response from an asynchronous request to an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Et svar fra en asynkron forespørsel til en XML-Web service-metoden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets proxy information for making an XML Web service request through a firewall.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir proxy-informasjon for å gjøre en XML-webtjenesteforespørselen gjennom en brannmur.

trans-unit.source: Use the Proxy property if a client needs to use different proxy settings than those in the system settings.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Proxy-egenskapen Hvis en klient må bruke annen proxy-innstillinger enn de som finnes i systeminnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> class to set the proxy settings, because it implements <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>klassen for å angi proxy-innstillinger fordi den implementerer <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>.</xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: Default proxy settings can be set in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Standard proxy-innstillingene, kan angis i en konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Configuring Internet Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [konfigurasjon av Internett-programmer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> that contains the proxy information for making requests through a firewall.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>som inneholder proxy-informasjon for forespørsler gjennom en brannmur.</xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>

trans-unit.source: The default value is the operating system proxy settings.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er operativsystemet proxy-innstillinger.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether connection sharing is enabled when the client uses NTLM authentication to connect to the Web server that hosts the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om tilkobling er aktivert når klienten bruker NTLM-godkjenning til å koble til serveren som er vert XML-webtjenesten.

trans-unit.source: This property sets the value of the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.UnsafeAuthenticatedConnectionSharing%2A> property of the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> used to communicate with the Web server.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir verdien for den <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.UnsafeAuthenticatedConnectionSharing%2A>for den <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>brukes til å kommunisere med serveren.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> </xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.UnsafeAuthenticatedConnectionSharing%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if connection sharing is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilkobling er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value for the user agent header that is sent with each request.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for agent-attributtet for brukeren som er sendt med hver forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The user agent string allows a Web server to identify the client.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som bruker agent kan en Web-server til å identifisere klienten.

trans-unit.source: The value of the HTTP protocol user agent header.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for HTTP-protokollen bruker agent-attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The default is "MS Web Services Client Protocol number ", where number is the version of the common language runtime (for example, 1.0.3705.0).
trans-unit.target: Standard "MS Web Services Client Protocol number ", der number versjon av common language runtime (for eksempel 1.0.3705.0).
